ComicInfo.Title: Riggins: The Father I Never Had; [Chapter 6:] "Rowdy" Three Become One
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: The Salmon of Doubt
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Rowdy 3 barge into Dirk and Sallyâ€™s lives again, making things particularly difficult for the Holistic Detective. Featuring favorite characters from the original books as well as the cast from the TV series, including Samuel Barnett and Elijah Wood!
